name: Bob Lee
overview:
Bob Lee is the CTO at Square. Before joining the mobile payment company in January 2010, he was previously a software engineer at Google. He created the Jolt award winning Guice framework. And he led the core library development on Android.
In April 2008 Lee created Twubble, a service that helps you find friends in [Twitter](http://www.crunchbase.com/company/twitter).
